downloadTitle: 2007 Office System Document: Groove Backup Options
downloadDescription: A description of Groove 2007 backup options in an enterprise deployment.
detailsSection: This document describes various options for backing up Groove 2007 user accounts and workspaces in a managed enterprise environment.
systemRequirementsSection:
This download works with the following Office programs:

  • Microsoft Office Groove 2007

  • Microsoft Office Groove Server 2007
installInstructionSection:
To install this download:

Download the .doc file by clicking the Download button (above) and saving the file to your hard disk, then open the document as you typically would.


To delete this download:

To remove the download file, delete the .doc file.
